other_tests.findings: Obstructive glottic edema at the vocal cords with pinpoint airway.
Exophytic posterior glottic mass and edematous, polypoid lesions involving bilateral true vocal cords.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperatively, the patient had resolution of his stridor.

other_tests.findings: Minute fragments of nonkeratinizing stratified epithelium with vague papillary appearance; negative for human papilloma virus (HPV).
